CR

Cameron Ray

Police Chief

213 E Blackjack St., Dublin TX, 76446

**Non-Emergencies:** Inside city limits, call Dublin PD:[**(254) 445-3455**](tel:(254) 445-3455) **Non-Emergencies:** Outside city, call Erath Sheriff:[**(254) 965-3318**](tel:(254) 965-3318)

**For Emergencies, call 911**

The Dublin Police Department consists of nine sworn peace officers and six certified telecommunicators. Among the nine peace officers are two certified School Resource Officers, one Investigator, and the patrol division.

Our Dispatch is operated by the six certified telecommunicators who are responsible for dispatching police, fire, and EMS. In addition to those responsibilities, dispatchers answer all incoming 9-1-1 calls.

​

The mission of the Dublin Police Department is to effectively provide for the protection of lives and property, preserve the public peace, and provide needed community services with the highest level of professionalism and ethical standards.

Interested in Employment?

Please download and complete both of the applications below and return them to the Dublin Police Department, with the required forms. Or stop by the department during office hours to pick up paper copies.

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
